channel.title: Portal Options?
channel.description:
i tried to make a zammy portal give you options. this is what i put:
[code]case 4388: // zamorak duel portal if (actionTimer == 0) { selectoption("Where would you like to go?", "Low level Open Fight (3-75)", "Low level Obstacle Fight", "High level Open Fight (76-150)", "High level Obstacle Fight", ""); OptionObject = 4388; }[/code]
ok, now when i compile, it says:
[code]client.java:2706: selectoption(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.Strin g,java.lang.String) in client cannot be applied to (java.lang.String,java.lang.S tring,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) selectoption("Where would you like to go?", "Low level Open Fight (3-75)", "Low level Obstacle Fight", "High level Open Fight (76-150)", "High level Obstacle Fi ght", ""); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
what do i do to fix this error?

item.title: Portal Options?
item.dc:creator: @R4ND0M R4ND0M
item.description:
@R4ND0M wrote:

ill just delete it and retry another time, thx runer king

item.title: Portal Options?
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

R4ND0M:

All I need to know is what the error means, then if I can modify my code to work with the compiler…

in client cannot be applied to You did something wrong. I have never messed with those.

item.title: Portal Options?
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

[quote=“R4ND0M, post:1, topic:172968”]i tried to make a zammy portal give you options. this is what i put:

case 4388: // zamorak duel portal if (actionTimer == 0) { selectoption("Where would you like to go?", "Low level Open Fight (3-75)", "Low level Obstacle Fight", "High level Open Fight (76-150)", "High level Obstacle Fight", ""); OptionObject = 4388; }

ok, now when i compile, it says:

client.java:2706: selectoption(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.Strin g,java.lang.String) in client cannot be applied to (java.lang.String,java.lang.S tring,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) selectoption("Where would you like to go?", "Low level Open Fight (3-75)", "Low level Obstacle Fight", "High level Open Fight (76-150)", "High level Obstacle Fi ght", ""); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

what do i do to fix this error?[/quote]
I don’t know. A useful skill to have is to be able to make minor adjustments until they work.

Good luck?

Read full topic
